response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and add value to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product holds an intrinsic worth of $1,500,000 to you. Considering this significant value and the importance of such an asset, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents an outstanding opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a price that reflects its true value while offering you a substantial saving. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how this product can be a game-changer for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
